## Introduction

The SeroHub is a platform to establish an __open research forum and information environment__, focusing on knowledge sharing, creating and fostering activities. Furthermore, SeroHub provides a general overview of research activities about seroprevalence studies.

### Overview Seroprevalence Studies

The plattform will provide an overview of all participating studies, about their:
    * Study Population,
    * Time of sampling,
    * Total population in the area,
    * Research questions,
    * Diagnostic test,
    * When is the start of sampling expected,
    * When are results expected and
    * Funding source.
    
### Later stages

All contributing researcher will get the opportiunity to submit anonymizied aggregated data and perfrom a meta-analysis with the data that other researchers share.

The general webpage concept is split into the general public site and the service environment only participating researcher can use.
